metadata.title: INFERNO-CORE
metadata.author: Kommandant_Julk and Vertaalfout
metadata.description: Dependency mod for Forgemaster. (and Forgotten races!) Features: - allows performing multiple actions during sector jump (one augment AND Cura) - Cura quests aren't lost on reroutes - Beam Pierce augment (beams gain +1 sp) - Fixes lvl 4 MC - Info buttons for some addons - some framework stuff for Forgemaster - some system cooldown related augment implementations - overwrites room resist images and implements dynamic rendering system ... and more stuff
